channel.title: Da' Hitman
channel.description: Certified Lord Gang DJ Da' Hitman is murder on the mix every week with a non-stop, high-energy blend of Hip-Hop and R&B. Step up your game and get on my level...if you didn't know, now you know.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Da' Hitman is murder on the mix - This is Hip-Hop the way it should be!
channel.itunes:author: Da' Hitman Certified LG DJ
channel.itunes:summary: Certified Lord Gang DJ Da' Hitman is murder on the mix every week with a non-stop, high-energy blend of Hip-Hop and R&B. Step up your game and get on my level...if you didn't know, now you know.

item.title: The Twitter Tape
item.description: This time we're taking it to Twitter and giving shine to new artists and new music all found through twitter connections. You can follow Da' Hitman at http://twitter.com/DaHitman. You can find all of the artists in this week's mix at the twitter urls below: Roccett – Give You Some Game Produced by Tha Bizness twitter.com/iamroccett Adebisi – 80’s Babies Produced by No Gimmicks Twitter.com/adebisiblaxceo Mistah F.A.B. – Um Hmm Produced by Traxamillion twitter.com/mistahfab Nina B – UnbeNINABle Produced by 6th Sense Twitter.com/remembermeninab Future – Into Your Mind Produced by TruSoul Twitter.com/youngfuture SHO ft Fat Pat – Where Them Haters At Produced by Woodknock Productions Twitter.com/skyhighworld Chilla Pertilla – Lean or Rock Produced by STR8 Crack Twitter.com/chillapertilla Bass Black, Jae Lei and LV – Game On Lock Produced by RythmIQ twitter.com/RythmIQ Madam Madon – Get At Me Produced by Text Sosa Twitter.com/madammadon Wreck-A-Mic ft Paul Wall – It Goes Down Produced by T. Hall and Big Tra twitter.com/thapeopleschamp Reynos ft Trey Songz – Brand New (remix) Twitter.com/reynos Lil Ronnie ft Tum Tum, HoodBoss, Double Double – She’s All Mine Produced by Blu Majic Twitter.com/lilronnie53 Steve Austin ft Brian Angel (Day 26) – How Come Produced by Twitter/com/bioniqmc The Scrayper Boyz ft Dem Hoodstarz - Starship Produced by The Beat Boxerz twitter.com/ansar_aka_zar Kandi Cole – Turn It Up Produced by PoetiQ Twitter.com/kandicole Tha Critic – Sowidit Produced by That Critic Twitter.com/thacritic Streetz & Young Deuces ft Eliseo – Shawty So Strapped Produced by Franchize Twitter.com/young_deuces Rasheeda – Boss Chick Produced by D- Lo Twitter.com/rasheedagapeach Scott Johnson – I Got You Produced by Mike Ruimixx Twitter.com/scottjohnson
item.dc:creator: Da' Hitman Certified LG DJ

This time we're taking it to Twitter and giving shine to new artists and new music all found through twitter connections. You can follow Da' Hitman at http://twitter.com/DaHitman. You can find all of the artists in this week's mix at the twitter urls below:
Roccett – Give You Some Game Produced by Tha Bizness twitter.com/iamroccett
Adebisi – 80’s Babies Produced by No Gimmicks Twitter.com/adebisiblaxceo
Mistah F.A.B. – Um Hmm Produced by Traxamillion twitter.com/mistahfab
Nina B – UnbeNINABle Produced by 6th Sense Twitter.com/remembermeninab
Future – Into Your Mind Produced by TruSoul Twitter.com/youngfuture
SHO ft Fat Pat – Where Them Haters At Produced by Woodknock Productions Twitter.com/skyhighworld
Chilla Pertilla – Lean or Rock Produced by STR8 Crack Twitter.com/chillapertilla
Bass Black, Jae Lei and LV – Game On Lock Produced by RythmIQ twitter.com/RythmIQ
Madam Madon – Get At Me Produced by Text Sosa Twitter.com/madammadon
Wreck-A-Mic ft Paul Wall – It Goes Down Produced by T. Hall and Big Tra twitter.com/thapeopleschamp
Reynos ft Trey Songz – Brand New (remix) Twitter.com/reynos
Lil Ronnie ft Tum Tum, HoodBoss, Double Double – She’s All Mine Produced by Blu Majic Twitter.com/lilronnie53
Steve Austin ft Brian Angel (Day 26) – How Come Produced by Twitter/com/bioniqmc
The Scrayper Boyz ft Dem Hoodstarz - Starship Produced by The Beat Boxerz twitter.com/ansar_aka_zar
Kandi Cole – Turn It Up Produced by PoetiQ Twitter.com/kandicole
Tha Critic – Sowidit Produced by That Critic Twitter.com/thacritic
Streetz & Young Deuces ft Eliseo – Shawty So Strapped Produced by Franchize Twitter.com/young_deuces
Rasheeda – Boss Chick Produced by D- Lo Twitter.com/rasheedagapeach
Scott Johnson – I Got You Produced by Mike Ruimixx Twitter.com/scottjohnson

item.title: Unique Styles Show Reppin Dallas
item.description: Taking you to Dallas Texas to hear what Dallas has to offer to Hip-Hop, including music from both majors and independents. 01 Intro – Wreck-a-Mic 02 Big Chief – When U Gone Let Me 03 Blofly – Get Throwed 04 Ricochet – Clean As a Whistle 05 KottonMouth – Certified 06 Wreck-a-Mic ft Magno and Teflon – Peep The Way I Strut 07 Big Chief ft Jim Jones – My Swagg 08 Young Phill – Bout Money 09 Young Muhammed ft Lil Wil – Baby Phat 10 Fat B – Dats How We Kick It 11 Damm D ft. Bun B, Mista Fab, Lloyd, Gator Main – Love Me Remix 12 Scott Johnson – Screw Ya’ll (produced by Mike Ruimix) 13 Wreck-a-Mic – God of Flow 14 Fort Nox - Live 15 SHO – Pass the Microphone and Watch Me Spit 16 Young Mabooda ft Trill Gates and Mike Wrecka – That’s What I’m Talkin Bout 17 Tekniq ft Paul Wall – Yeah 18 Spark, Tum Tum, Hoodboss, Supastarr, Fat Pimp – All On Me Remix 19 Fat B – It’s Goin Down 20 Big Tuck – Stuntaman
item.dc:creator: Da' Hitman Certified LG DJ

item.title: Unique Styles Show
item.description: Back again to break new music from Doitall, Wreck-a-Mic, Madam Madon, and Scott Johnson - along with the interview and feature of Fort Nox and their music. Da' Hitman is back in the mix and picking up eight where he left off. 1. Scott Johnson – Hitman Anthem 2. Doitall – Do It 3. Wreck-a-Mic – God of Flow 4. SHO – Half a Brick 5. Fort Nox – Time 6. Interview with Fort Nox Segment 7. Fort Nox – That’s Wassup 8. Interview with Fort Nox Segment 9. Fort Nox – One That Got Away 10. Interview with Fort Nox Segment 11. Fort Nox – It’s That Real 12. Interview with Fort Nox Wrap Up 13. Fort Nox – Grown Folkz Music 14. Madam Madon – Get At Me 15. Scott Johnson introduces Remix Competition 16. Scott Johnson – Snake Charmer 17. Music G and the Underground Army – I’m Up 18. Madam Madon – Bennin Rd Bomber 19. Doitall – There’s a Time For Play 20. Doitall – Make It Do What It Do 21. LOTUG – Are We Clear 22. Scott Johnson – Mutha F*cka I’m Ill
item.dc:creator: Da' Hitman Certified LG DJ

item.title: The Unique Styles Show
item.description: Back again with a unique blend of Hip-Hop and R&B and a new spin on the mix from Da' Hitman with a little screwed and chopped jump-off (shouts out to Lord Gang DJ Poppa Hatz). Here's the playlist: 1. Scott Johnson – Hitman Anthem 2. Fat Bastard – Dats How We Kick It 3. Madam Madon – Uhh Uhh Baby 4. Mel Gates – They Scheming 5. Blvd Benny ft Jadakiss and Fabolous – Rockit Out 6. Rappa Sharp ft Cheri Dennis – The Stage 7. Novakane ft RL – Love & Hate 8. Pharell ft Lil’ Wayne – Yes 9. SHO – What U Know About Me 10. Blofly – Get Throwed 11. Renaissance, Lil Wayne, Busta Rhymes, Keri Hilson – Turnin Me On 12. G Mack ft Bobby V – Get Naked 13. Wreck-a-Mic ft Teflon and Magno – Peep The Way I Strut 14. Tre Gator – Breathe 15. Lighter ft T Rex – Eat That 16. Scott Johnson – Snake Charmer 17. Unlady Like – Bartender 18. Outro
item.dc:creator: Da' Hitman Certified LG DJ

1. Scott Johnson – Hitman Anthem 2. Fat Bastard – Dats How We Kick It 3. Madam Madon – Uhh Uhh Baby 4. Mel Gates – They Scheming 5. Blvd Benny ft Jadakiss and Fabolous – Rockit Out 6. Lighter ft T Rex – Eat That 16. Scott Johnson – Snake Charmer 17. Unlady Like – Bartender 18. Outro

item.title: Unique Styles Show
item.description: Once again it's on! Da' Hitman delivers the weekly fix of dope Hip-Hop with the Unique Styles Show. The illest blend of Hip-Hop from coast to coast - indie to major. And it goes a little somethin' like this... 1. Scott Johnson – Hitman Anthem 2. Lord Gang DJs Get It In 3. Hott Stylz ft Slim and Yung Joc – Ooh Yeah 4. Ludacris ft Chris Brown and Sean Garret – What Them Girls Like 5. Frank Black ft CP Hollywood – I’m Zo Blowed 6. Mel Gates – Get Ya’ Swagger Up 7. J-Khrist ft Kountree – Money 8. Hitman Promo Run 9. M-Dot – No Thanks To You 10. Wreck-a-Mic –Either Or 11. Jake One ft Blueprint – Scared 12. Special Teamz ft Ill Bill – Dirty Money 13. Special Teamz – Sterotype 14. Trap – Death Threats 15. Loaded ft SHO – Got My Soljas On (World Premier) 16. Cash ft SHO – Walk Wit A Dip 17. Ben One ft Twista Sly Polaroid – Never Leave my Girl 18. Rasheeda – Boss Chick 19. Scott Johnson – Snake Charmer (World Premier) 20. NOE – Superstar 21. Scott Johnson – Hitman’s Departure
